attempts.raw_output:
Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

/--
Let $A$ and $B$ be points on the same branch of the hyperbola $xy=1$. Suppose that $P$ is a point lying between $A$ and $B$ on this hyperbola, such that the area of the triangle $APB$ is as large as possible. Show that the region bounded by the hyperbola and the chord $AP$ has the same area as the region bounded by the hyperbola and the chord $PB$.
-/
theorem putnam_2015_a1
  (hyperbola : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
  (hhyperbola : hyperbola = {p | p 1 = 1 / p 0 ∧ p 0 > 0})
  (A B P : Fin 2 → ℝ)
  (PPline : (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (ℝ → ℝ))
  (hAB : A ∈ hyperbola ∧ B ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < B 0)
  (hP : P ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P 0 ∧ P 0 < B 0 ∧ (∀ P', (P' ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P' 0 ∧ P' 0 < B 0) → MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P', B}) ≤ MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P, B})))
  (hPPline : ∀ P1 P2, P1 0 ≠ P2 0 → PPline P1 P2 = (fun x : ℝ => ((P2 1 - P1 1) / (P2 0 - P1 0)) * (x - P1 0) + P1 1)) :
  ∫ x in Set.Ioo (A 0) (P 0), (PPline A P) x - 1 / x = ∫ x in Set.Ioo (P 0) (B 0), (PPline P B) x - 1 / x :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2015_a1
  (hyperbola : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
  (hhyperbola : hyperbola = {p | p 1 = 1 / p 0 ∧ p 0 > 0})
  (A B P : Fin 2 → ℝ)
  (PPline : (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (ℝ → ℝ))
  (hAB : A ∈ hyperbola ∧ B ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < B 0)
  (hP : P ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P 0 ∧ P 0 < B 0 ∧ (∀ P', (P' ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P' 0 ∧ P' 0 < B 0) → MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P', B}) ≤ MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P, B})))
  (hPPline : ∀ P1 P2, P1 0 ≠ P2 0 → PPline P1 P2 = (fun x : ℝ => ((P2 1 - P1 1) / (P2 0 - P1 0)) * (x - P1 0) + P1 1)) :
  ∫ x in Set.Ioo (A 0) (P 0), (PPline A P) x - 1 / x = ∫ x in Set.Ioo (P 0) (B 0), (PPline P B) x - 1 / x := by
  have h₁ := hP.2.1
  have h₂ := hP.2.2.1
  have h₃ := hP.2.2.2
  have h₄ := hAB.1
  have h₅ := hAB.2.1
  have h₆ := hAB.2.2
  have h₇ := hPPline A P
  have h₈ := hPPline P B
  have h₉ := hP.1
  have h₁₀ := hP.2.2.2
  have h₁₁ := h₁₀ A
  have h₁₂ := h₁₀ B
  have h₁₃ := h₁₀ P
  simp_all [hhyperbola, Fin.sum_univ_succ]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> field_simp [sub_ne_zero, mul_comm] at *
  <;> ring_nf at *
  <;> norm_num at *
  <;> linarith
```

  (hyperbola : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
  (hhyperbola : hyperbola = {p | p 1 = 1 / p 0 ∧ p 0 > 0})
  (A B P : Fin 2 → ℝ)

  (hPPline : ∀ P1 P2, P1 0 ≠ P2 0 → PPline P1 P2 = (fun x : ℝ => ((P2 1 - P1 1) / (P2 0 - P1 0)) * (x - P1 0) + P1 1)) :
  ∫ x in Set.Ioo (A 0) (P 0), (PPline A P) x - 1 / x = ∫ x in Set.Ioo (P 0) (B 0), (PPline P B) x - 1 / x :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_2015_a1
  (hyperbola : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
  (hhyperbola : hyperbola = {p | p 1 = 1 / p 0 ∧ p 0 > 0})
  (A B P : Fin 2 → ℝ)
  (PPline : (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (ℝ → ℝ))
  (hAB : A ∈ hyperbola ∧ B ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < B 0)
  (hP : P ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P 0 ∧ P 0 < B 0 ∧ (∀ P', (P' ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P' 0 ∧ P' 0 < B 0) → MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P', B}) ≤ MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P, B})))
  (hPPline : ∀ P1 P2, P1 0 ≠ P2 0 → PPline P1 P2 = (fun x : ℝ => ((P2 1 - P1 1) / (P2 0 - P1 0)) * (x - P1 0) + P1 1)) :
  ∫ x in Set.Ioo (A 0) (P 0), (PPline A P) x - 1 / x = ∫ x in Set.Ioo (P 0) (B 0), (PPline P B) x - 1 / x := by
  have h₁ := hP.2.2.2 (⟨P 0, by
    simp_all [hhyperbola, Fin.val_zero]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> field_simp [hP.1, hAB.1, hAB.2.1, hAB.2.2]
    <;> nlinarith
  ⟩)
  have h₂ := hP.2.2.2 (⟨A 0, by
    simp_all [hhyperbola, Fin.val_zero]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> field_simp [hP.1, hAB.1, hAB.2.1, hAB.2.2]
    <;> nlinarith
  ⟩)
  have h₃ := hP.2.2.2 (⟨B 0, by
    simp_all [hhyperbola, Fin.val_zero]
    <;> norm_num
    <;> field_simp [hP.1, hAB.1, hAB.2.1, hAB.2.2]
    <;> nlinarith
  ⟩)
  simp_all [hPPline, Fin.val_zero]
  <;> field_simp [hP.1, hAB.1, hAB.2.1, hAB.2.2] at *
  <;> nlinarith
```

  (hhyperbola : hyperbola = {p | p 1 = 1 / p 0 ∧ p 0 > 0})
  (A B P : Fin 2 → ℝ)
  (PPline : (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (ℝ → ℝ))
  (hAB : A ∈ hyperbola ∧ B ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < B 0)
  (hP : P ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P 0 ∧ P 0 < B 0 ∧ (∀ P', (P' ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P' 0 ∧ P' 0 < B 0) → MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P', B}) ≤ MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P, B})))
  (hPPline : ∀ P1 P2, P1 0 ≠ P2 0 → PPline P1 P2 = (fun x : ℝ => ((P2 1 - P1 1) / (P2 0 - P1 0)) * (x - P1 0) + P1 1)) :
  ∫ x in Set.Ioo (A 0) (P 0), (PPline A P) x - 1 / x = ∫ x in Set.Ioo (P 0) (B 0), (PPline P B) x - 1 / x := by
  have h₁ := hP.2.1
  have h₂ := hP.2.2.1
  have h₃ := hP.2.2.2
  have h₄ := hAB.1
  have h₅ := hAB.2.1
  have h₆ := hAB.2.2
  have h₇ := hPPline (⟨1, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2) (⟨1, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2)
  have h₈ := hPPline (⟨2, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2) (⟨2, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2)
  have h₉ := hPPline (⟨1, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2) (⟨2, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2)
  have h₁₀ := hPPline (⟨2, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2) (⟨1, by norm_num⟩ : Fin 2)
  norm_num [hhyperbola, Fin.sum_univ_succ] at h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀
  <;> simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ, mul_comm]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> ring_nf
  <;> norm_num
  <;> field_simp [h₁, h₂, h₃, h₄, h₅, h₆, h₇, h₈, h₉, h₁₀]
  <;> linarith
```

import Mathlib

/--
Let $A$ and $B$ be points on the same branch of the hyperbola $xy=1$. Suppose that $P$ is a point lying between $A$ and $B$ on this hyperbola, such that the area of the triangle $APB$ is as large as possible. Show that the region bounded by the hyperbola and the chord $AP$ has the same area as the region bounded by the hyperbola and the chord $PB$.

  (hyperbola : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
  (hhyperbola : hyperbola = {p | p 1 = 1 / p 0 ∧ p 0 > 0})
  (A B P : Fin 2 → ℝ)
  (PPline : (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (Fin 2 → ℝ) → (ℝ → ℝ))
  (hAB : A ∈ hyperbola ∧ B ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < B 0)
  (hP : P ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P 0 ∧ P 0 < B 0 ∧ (∀ P', (P' ∈ hyperbola ∧ A 0 < P' 0 ∧ P' 0 < B 0) → MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P', B}) ≤ MeasureTheory.volume (convexHull ℝ {A, P, B})))
  (hPPline : ∀ P1 P2, P1 0 ≠ P2 0 → PPline P1 P2 = (fun x : ℝ => ((P2 1 - P1 1) / (P2 0 - P1 0)) * (x - P1 0) + P1 1)) :

  have h₆ := hAB.2.2
